name: Holiday Schedule
description: Data table for managing contact center holiday closures and custom messages

attributes.name: is_closed
attributes.description: Whether the contact center is closed

attributes.name: open_time
attributes.description: Opening time if reduced hours (HH:MM format)

attributes.name: close_time
attributes.description: Closing time if reduced hours (HH:MM format)

attributes.name: custom_message
attributes.description: Custom IVR message for this holiday

attributes.name: redirect_queue
attributes.description: Queue to redirect to if partially open

sampleData.custom_message: Happy New Year! Our offices are closed today. We will reopen on January 2nd.
Happy Independence Day! Our offices are closed today.
Happy Thanksgiving! Our offices are closed today and tomorrow.
We are operating on reduced hours today from 10 AM to 2 PM.
We are closing early today at noon for Christmas Eve.
Merry Christmas! Our offices are closed today.

flowUsage.description: Use Data Table block to check if current date is a holiday
